commentsOfSuccessDescription.below40: Not that good! Make sure to try again!
commentsOfSuccessDescription.below80: You did well! But it's not perfect yet... stay on the path and its all going to be nice!

questions.question: Which mushroom is good for your character?
And what does that mushroom gives to your character besides hunger?
Who is the giant of winter?

options.secondAnswer: He wants to destroy you aggressively
options.thirdAnswer: He kills mobs right after he spawned

questions.question: Which is the most dangerous happening during summer?
What happens when you get completely wet by rains or the sea?

options.secondAnswer: The character instantly loses a desired amount of sanity

questions.question: What is the lightning rod is used for?

options.secondAnswer: Protects a specified area from lightning
options.thirdAnswer: You can cook meals with it when you charge it

questions.valueOfRightAnswer: Protects a specified area from lightning
